name: Topaz
description:
Topaz is an in-development arcade game.

Box in your enemies.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to push blocks around the field to create cages for the enemies (red robots). They must be surrounded by eight blocks. Pressing Space will drop land mines (limited quantity). Since there's no tutorial or instructions as of yet here are the game rules:

  • The enemies can move diagonally.
  • The enemies add one to their ranks each level.
  • The enemies move slightly more often each level.
  • The enemies will continue to hunt you if you accidentally free them.
  • You get 1 land mine per level.
  • The level ends and goes to the next one when all enemies on screen are trapped.
  • Land mines will stun enemies for roughly 5 seconds when stepped on.
